name: timehut-pwa
description: A private family baby memory book Progressive Web App

scripts.firebase:emulators: cd firebase && firebase emulators:start --only auth,firestore --project timehut-local
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run firebase:emulators" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/frontend && npm run build --workspace=packages/media-api
